flavor_text: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
Thought to be an embodiment of the sun it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokemon from freezing.
